overview:
Joe currently is the CEO and Co-Founder of Vorstack Corporation.

Prior to founding Vorstack, Joe was an EIR with Foundation Capital.

Prior to being an EIR, Joe was an executive at LiveOps for 7 years being a key leader during its high growth phase. Joe held a number of positions at LiveOps most recently serving as the General Manager of the companyâ€™s Enterprise Agent business unit and SVP overseeing the 20,000 member agent community.

Joeâ€™s work at LiveOps was represented best by his leading roles in the launch of a number of successful initiatives including his General Manager role where numerous brand recognizable financial and technology clients became customers. Joe was the first General Manager of the Saas Contact Center offering where he led the team responsible for signing initial customers and defining the product. Joe also was the executive lead responsible for forming the companyâ€™s award winning foundation. Joe began his career at LiveOps as itâ€™s General Counsel.

Prior to LiveOps, Joe held numerous legal positions at Inktomi. At the time of Inktomiâ€™s sale to Yahoo!, Joe was General Counsel.

Prior to Inktomi, Joe was a corporate associate with Wilson Sonsini Goodrich and Rosati where he represented many successful venture backed and public companies.

Joe also is an active angel investor making small investments in exciting early stage start-ups.

Joe also is closely involved in philanthropy serving on the Board of Hidden Villa where he chairs the technology commission.
